meanings.definition: A person who poses, especially for a photograph.
meanings.sent1: The posser smiled for the camera during the family photo.
meanings.sent2: The professional model was a skilled posser in the fashion show.
meanings.sent3: The posser made funny faces to entertain the children during the photo shoot.
meanings.sent4: She was a natural posser, effortlessly striking elegant poses.
meanings.sent5: The posser's confident stance made a lasting impression on the photographer.

meanings.definition: To assume a particular attitude or stance, especially for a photograph.
meanings.sent1: She would posser gracefully whenever a camera was pointed at her.
meanings.sent2: The group possered together for the class picture.
meanings.sent3: He possered dramatically, pretending to be a superhero.
meanings.sent4: Possering like a model, she held her pose perfectly still.
meanings.sent5: Possering awkwardly, he tried to mimic the poses of the professional models.

meanings.definition: A tool used for agitating clothes in a tub of water during washing.
meanings.sent1: The old-fashioned posser was used by our grandparents for laundry.
meanings.sent2: She used the posser to wash the delicate fabrics gently.
meanings.sent3: The posser splashed water everywhere during the laundry day.
meanings.sent4: The posser worked tirelessly to clean the clothes in the tub.
meanings.sent5: The rhythmic sound of the posser in the water was oddly soothing.
